definition.name: Azure WebApp Container
definition.description: Deploy Container Web Apps to Azure. github.com/Azure/Actions
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: app-name
inputs.description: Name of the Azure Web App

inputs.name: slot-name
inputs.description: Enter an existing Slot other than the Production slot

inputs.name: images
inputs.description: Specify the fully qualified container image(s) name. For example, 'myregistry.azurecr.io/nginx:latest' or 'python:3.7.2-alpine/'. For multi-container scenario multiple container image names can be provided (multi-line separated)

inputs.name: configuration-file
inputs.description: Path of the Docker-Compose file. Should be a fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory. Required for multi-container scenario

inputs.name: container-command
inputs.description: Enter the start up command. For ex. dotnet run or dotnet filename.dll

outputs.name: webapp-url
outputs.description: URL to work with your webapp

latest_release.name: GitHub Action for Azure Web App for Containers
